   20: 
   21: -module(pubkey_cert_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: %% CT callbacks
   26: -export([all/0,
   27:          groups/0]).
   28: 
   29: %% Test cases
   30: -export([time_str_2_gregorian_utc_post2000/0,
   31:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_post2000/1,
   32:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_before_current_time/0,
   33:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_before_current_time/1,
   34:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_51_years_before_current_time/0,
   35:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_51_years_before_current_time/1,
   36:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_from_current_time/0,
   37:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_from_current_time/1,
   38:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_49_years_from_current_time/0,
   39:          time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_49_years_from_current_time/1,
   40:          time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_before_current_time/0,
   41:          time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_before_current_time/1,
   42:          time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_from_current_time/0,
   43:          time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_from_current_time/1
   44:         ]).
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: 
   50: all() ->
   51:     [{group, time_str_2_gregorian_sec}].
   52: 
   53: groups() ->
   54:     [{time_str_2_gregorian_sec, [], time_str_two_gregorian()}].
   55: 
   56: time_str_two_gregorian() ->
   57:     [time_str_2_gregorian_utc_post2000,
   58:      time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_before_current_time,
   59:      time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_51_years_before_current_time,
   60:      time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_from_current_time,
   61:      time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_49_years_from_current_time,
   62:      time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_before_current_time,
   63:      time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_from_current_time
   64:     ].
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_post2000() ->
   69:     [{doc, "Tests a valid gregorian Utc time"}].
   70: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_post2000(_) ->
   71:     YYMMDD = "450101",
   72:     HHMMSSZ = "000000Z",
   73:     ExpectedYear = 2045,
   74:     UtcTime = {utcTime, YYMMDD ++ HHMMSSZ},
   75:     {ExpectedDate, _} = convert_to_datetime_format(UtcTime, ExpectedYear),
   76: 
   77:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
   78:     {ExpectedDate, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
   79: 
   80: 
   81: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_before_current_time() ->
   82:     [{doc, "Tests limit of gregorian Utc time 50 years before current time"}].
   83: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_before_current_time(_) ->
   84:     {ExpectedDate, UtcTime} = get_date(utcTime, -50),
   85:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
   86:     {ExpectedDate, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
   87: 
   88: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_51_years_before_current_time() ->
   89:     [{doc, "Tests limit of gregorian Utc time 51 years before current time"}].
   90: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_51_years_before_current_time(_) ->
   91:     {{Y, M, D}, UtcTime} = get_date(utcTime, -51),
   92:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
   93:     %% the sliding window method from pubkey_cert reaches its limit and
   94:     %% reverses the year from 19XX to 20XX. Because of this, the expected
   95:     %% year is current_year + 50, or ExpectedYear + 100 (they are equivalent)
   96:     ExpectedYear = Y + 100,
   97:     {{ExpectedYear, M, D}, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
   98: 
   99: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_from_current_time() ->
  100:     [{doc, "Tests a valid gregorian Utc time 50 years from now"}].
  101: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_50_years_from_current_time(_) ->
  102:     {{Y, M, D}, UtcTime} = get_date(utcTime, 50),
  103:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
  104:     %% the sliding window method from pubkey_cert reaches its limit and
  105:     %% reverses the year from 20XX to 19XX. Because of this, the expected
  106:     %% year is current_year - 50, or ExpectedYear - 100 (they are equivalent)
  107:     ExpectedYear = Y - 100,
  108:     {{ExpectedYear, M, D}, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
  109: 
  110: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_49_years_from_current_time() ->
  111:     [{doc, "Tests a valid gregorian Utc time 49 years from now"}].
  112: time_str_2_gregorian_utc_limit_49_years_from_current_time(_) ->
  113:     {ExpectedDate, UtcTime} = get_date(utcTime, 49),
  114:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
  115:     {ExpectedDate, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
  116: 
  117: 
  118: time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_before_current_time() ->
  119:     [{doc, "Tests a valid general time 50 years before current time"}].
  120: time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_before_current_time(_) ->
  121:     {ExpectedDate, UtcTime} = get_date(generalTime, -50),
  122:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
  123:     {ExpectedDate, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
  124: 
  125: 
  126: time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_from_current_time() ->
  127:     [{doc, "Tests a valid general time 50 years from now"}].
  128: time_str_2_gregorian_generaltime_50_years_from_current_time(_) ->
  129:     {ExpectedDate, UtcTime} = get_date(generalTime, 50),
  130:     Result = pubkey_cert:time_str_2_gregorian_sec(UtcTime),
  131:     {ExpectedDate, _} = calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(Result).
  132: 
  133: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  134: %%
  135: %% Helper functions
  136: %%
  137: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  138: 
  139: -spec convert_to_datetime_format({Format, Date}, ExpectedYear) -> Result when
  140:       Format :: generalTime | utcTime,
  141:       Date :: YYMMDDHHMMSS | YYYYMMDDHHMMSS,
  142:       YYMMDDHHMMSS :: string(),
  143:       YYYYMMDDHHMMSS :: string(),
  144:       ExpectedYear :: non_neg_integer(),
  145:       Result :: {{non_neg_integer(), 1..12, 1..31}, {0, 0, 0}}.
  146: convert_to_datetime_format({Format, Date}, ExpectedYear) ->
  147:     YYMMDD = group_year(Format, Date),
  148:     [Y, M, D] = lists:map(fun (Str) -> erlang:list_to_integer(Str) end, YYMMDD),
  149:     %% assertions to test that the result is the expected one
  150:     case Format of
  151:         utcTime -> true = (ExpectedYear rem 100) == Y;
  152:         generalTime -> true = ExpectedYear == Y
  153:     end,
  154:     {{ExpectedYear, M, D}, {0, 0, 0}}.
  155: 
  156: -spec get_date(Format, YearsFromNow) -> {{Year, Month, Day}, UtcDate} when
  157:       Format :: utcTime | generalTime,
  158:       YearsFromNow :: integer(),
  159:       Year :: non_neg_integer(),
  160:       Month :: 1..12,
  161:       Day :: 1..31,
  162:       UtcDate :: string().
  163: get_date(Format, Years) ->
  164:     {YYYY, MM0, DD0} = date(),
  165:     MM = io_lib:format("~2..0w", [MM0]),
  166:     DD = io_lib:format("~2..0w", [DD0]),
  167:     ExpectedYear = YYYY + Years,
  168:     YYMMDD = format_year(Format, ExpectedYear, {MM, DD}),
  169:     HHMMSSZ = "000000Z",
  170:     FormattedTime = {Format, YYMMDD ++ HHMMSSZ},
  171:     {ExpectedDate, _} = convert_to_datetime_format(FormattedTime, ExpectedYear),
  172:     {ExpectedDate, FormattedTime}.
  173: 
  174: -spec format_year(Format, ExpectedYear, {Month, Day}) -> YYMMDD | YYYYMMDD when
  175:       Format :: utcTime | generalTime,
  176:       ExpectedYear :: non_neg_integer(),
  177:       Month :: string(),
  178:       Day :: string(),
  179:       YYMMDD :: string(),
  180:       YYYYMMDD :: string().
  181: format_year(utcTime, ExpectedYear, {MM, DD}) ->
  182:     YY = erlang:integer_to_list((ExpectedYear) rem 100),
  183:     lists:flatten(YY++MM++DD);
  184: format_year(generalTime, ExpectedYear, {MM, DD}) ->
  185:     YY = erlang:integer_to_list(ExpectedYear),
  186:     lists:flatten(YY++MM++DD).
  187: 
  188: -spec group_year(Format, Date) -> [list()] when
  189:       Format :: utcTime | generalTime,
  190:       Date :: [non_neg_integer()].
  191: group_year(utcTime, [Y1, Y2, M1, M2, D1, D2 | _]) ->
  192:     [[Y1, Y2], [M1, M2], [D1, D2]];
  193: group_year(generalTime, [Y1, Y2, Y3, Y4, M1, M2, D1, D2 | _]) ->
  194:     [[Y1, Y2, Y3, Y4], [M1, M2], [D1, D2]].
